titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 670) to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to ensure that pregnant women receiving assistance under title X of the Public Health Service Act are provided with information and counseling regarding their pregnancies, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-41, by Ms. Slaughter.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 670 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order. No amendment to the bill shall be in order except those printed in the report accomanying this resolution. Each amendment shall be offered in the order, manner, and debatable as specified in the report. Amendments shall not be subject to further amendment, except as specified. The amendment in the form of a motion to strike specified in the report, to be offered by Rep. Bartlett, shall not be in order if the text proposed to be stricken has been rewritten by a previous amendment. Upon adoption of this resolution, H. Res. 81 shall be laid upon the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 23.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 252 - 164 (Roll no. 90).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 247 - 169 (Roll no. 91).

action.text: Ms. Slaughter moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Moakley moved to table the motion to reconsider
On motion to table the motion to reconsider Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 165 (Roll no. 92).

bill.summary: 3/23/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 670 (public health services for pregnant women).
